Module.Text:
It mainly talked about the arch of reddah.com from test view, the following are just my notes:
  1. We have 5 test environments: dev, main, rtm, dnet, qfe
  2. There's no AP dev environment currently
  3. Create a user in main, and you can use it in all other test environments
  4. dev to main everyday
  5. main to rtm every 2 weeks
  6. rtm to prod every month
  7. support PM is David Ciuba, seems he took the video
  8. There are still some conceptions not clear
  • What is Shadown Prod
  • cnet, what for, when available?
  • xblob, npdb where is it?
  • live cache strategy
